entry.title: Bitcoin Forms Bullish On-Chain Signal That Led To 200% Price Rally Last Time
entry.summary:

Traders‚Äô Realized Losses Below -12 Again ‚Äî What Happened Last Time?
In a recent post on the X platform, prominent crypto analyst Ali Martinez pointed out that the amount of losses being realized by Bitcoin traders has been increasing in recent weeks. This on-chain revelation is based on the CryptoQuant Profit/Loss Margin metric, which aggregates profits and losses from all Bitcoin transactions.

entry.title: No Bail For Tornado Cash Dev Alexey Pertsev, Dutch Court Rules
entry.summary:
The continuous legal dispute over the Tornado Cash cryptocurrency mixer has the blockchain sector on alert as developers consider the disturbing consequences of assigning coders responsibility for the usage of their software by others.
The Pertsev Predicament
Alexey Pertsev, the 31-year-old Russian developer who was convicted in May for money laundering connected to Tornado Cash, sits at the core of the storm.
A representative for Pertsev disclosed that the Dutch Court of Appeal of‚Äôs-Hertogenbosch has decided that he must remain in custody.
Pertsev‚Äôs attorneys had requested for their client to be released on house arrest so he may adequately prepare his appeal, but a Dutch court has now denied that request and decided to keep him under custody.

entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: -$14m. BTC drops to $60k, CME gap filed again. $1bn shorts liquidated if we rally to $62.6k. Pump(.)fun surpasses ETH for revenue. ETH will outperform BTC after ETF launch: K33. ETH ETF may be delayed even further. BTC heading to $150k: Fundstrat. Chainlink & Fidelity partner for fund data on-chain. USDC protects the dollar: Circle ad. Robinhood considers crypto futures in US & EU. Another BTC miner looks to IPO in US. Vitalik bullish on prediction markets. Sentient Labs raises $85m for AI on SOL. Mantra to tokenise $500m of real estate. TAO falls 15% after security breach. Crypto scams & hacks hit $572m in Q2.

entry.summary: BTC ETF inflows hit highest in a month. ETH ETF inflows to hit $5bn in 6 months: Gemini. ETH public funds see largest outflow since 2022. SOL hits new ATH for monthly economic value. Sellers starting to look exhausted: Crypto Quant. Silvergate sued by SEC, settles for $63m. Circle gets stablecoin license for USDC in EU. US DoJ ironically chooses Coinbase for custody. Bitcoin miner aims for $16bn IPO. Bitfarms increases BTC mining amid takeover attempt. DOT has 2 year runway amid large burn. DOT ecosystem builders turn against team. PENDLE TVL falls $3bn as restaking rewards end. PayPal stablecoin goes live on Jupiter. At least $600m altcoin unlocks this month.

German government sells $24m more more BTC. Mt Gox info probably ‚Äòleaked to insiders‚Äô. Mr 100 buys dip for first time in 34 days. SOL leads Moonpay transactions for 5th week. entry.title: Transhumanism and the Quest for Immortality with SingularityNET CEO Dr. Ben Goertzel
entry.summary: Transhumanism is a philosophical and intellectual movement that advocates the enhancement of the human condition using technologies that can increase longevity, cognition, and well-being. In this interview, SingularityNET founder and CEO Dr. Ben Goertzel discusses his background in the transhumanist movement and how AI, and AGI will play a part.

entry.title: Vivendi Web3 Lead: 'There's No Ethical GenAI if You Don't Protect Content'
entry.summary: Fabien Aufrechter, VP of Web 3.0 at Vivendi, joined Rug Radio's Farokh aboard the Joker Odyssey at Cannes Lions to discuss the media group's plans for a global digital copyright, and how token-gated media will lead to the end of third-party cookies.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 148 - SOL ETF NARRATIVE DOMINATES
entry.summary: SOL leads majors as Van Eck files for ETF. Bitwise hints at SOL ETF filing. SOL will get ETF, ADA & XRP won‚Äôt: GSR. SOL price may rise 8.9x with ETF: GSR. Coinbase & Stripe team up for onboarding. BTC miner sell pressure weakens. BTC activity drops to lowest level in 10 years. Steve Cohen shuts down crypto arm of hedge fund. Crypto unmentioned in Presidential debate. Kraken co-founder donates $1m to Trump. Bolivia lifts BTC ban. MegaLabs raises $20m, aims for 100k TPS.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 147 - THE BLAST FALLOUT

Most ‚Äòobvious & attractive‚Äô buying opp possible. US man convicted of home invasions to steal BTC. Blast launches at $2.5bn FDV, disappoints many. ADA faces DDoS attacks with 200 transactions. Animoca Brands considers public listing.

Helius allows SOL staking from X. Drift allows you to leverage trade from X. ETH supply increases for 73 days straight. ETF review going smoothly: Gensler. Expect $15bn net inflows for ETH ETF: Bitwise. VanEck to waive ETH ETF fee until 2025. UAE new regulations could limit stablecoins. Court convicts two men for crypto ‚Äòsecurities fraud‚Äô. FTX creditors to vote on cash or crypto repayment.

entry.title: Mika Shares How to Send and Receive Crypto Using Kraken Wallet
entry.summary: Join Rug Radio creator and crypto influencer Mika as she guides you through the process of sending and receiving cryptocurrency using the Kraken wallet.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 144 - A VERY RED DAY

Open Interest rises as shorts grow, funding negative. BTC is economic immortality, going to $10m: Saylor. Moment of truth for BTC to rebound: Ansem. Expect $61-62k BTC to hold: Emperor BTC. Rumours SEC case vs Coinbase also dropped. Standard Chatered setup spot trading desk. ARB has record daily revenue on LayerZero claims. CFTC investigating Jump Crypto. FTM outperforms ahead of Sonic upgrade. Binance integrates USDT on TON. Onchain prediction market TVL continues to soar.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 142 - ETH LEADS THE RALLY
entry.summary: ETH continues to lead gains, SOL underperforms. BTC may rebound as Fed liquidity rips higher. ETH sees large amount of bullish call activity. LayerZero launches today, 25% unlock. Funding level the lowest in 3 months. German government sends 1000 BTC to exchanges. Stablecoins to become 10% of money: Circle CEO. Stabelcoin transfers up 16x in 4 years. BTC exchanges balances hit 3 year low. SOL again flips ETH for DEX volumes. Kraken reports $3m bug exploit found by CertiK. Debate about whether CertiK were whitehats.
